item.title: Colophon
item.description: Website This website was built with the following technologies. blogdown Hugo Theme The Hugo theme utilized was developed by Alex Tacnet. cocoa enhanced Hosting Hosting is provided through netlify. Simple instructions for getting setup can be found within Chapter 3.1 of the blogdown book/site.
